snippet: Britain's top business lobby upgraded its economic growth forecasts for this year and next on Monday and said it expects to see marked improvements in British business investment and productivity....

headline.print_headline: UK Business Lobby Sees Brighter Economic Outlook, Boosted by Investment
headline.main: UK Business Lobby Sees Brighter Economic Outlook, Boosted by Investment

lead_paragraph: Britain's top business lobby upgraded its economic growth forecasts for this year and next on Monday and said it expects to see marked improvements in British business investment and productivity.
